publication.title: SIPs: Shift-and-invert parallel spectral transformations
publication.keyword: Design and Implementation;Distributed Computing;Eigenvalue Distribution;Eigenvalue Problem;Eigenvalues;Material Model;Object-oriented Software;Parallel Computer;Software Package;Spectrum;
publication.abstract: SIPs is a new e!cie nt and robust software package implementing multiple shift-and-invert spectral transformations on parallel computers. Built on top of SLEPc and PETSc, it can compute very large number of eigenpairs for sparse generalized Hermitian eigenvalue problems.
